text: A bodice () is an article of clothing for women, covering the body from the neck to the waist. ==Further reading== *Arnold, Janet: Patterns of Fashion: the cut and construction of clothes for men and women 1560-1620, Macmillan, 1985. () *Steele, Valerie: The Corset: A Cultural History, Yale University Press, 2001. ==Other websites== * * Category:Tops (clothing)
title: Bodice
